duties_responsibilities.duty: Calibrate, troubleshoot, maintain, and operate all lab equipment
Perform analysis in accordance with Quality Operating Standards (QOS) methods and standard operator procedures (SOPs), accurately and efficiently
Accurately record and communicate analytical results
Follow all safety policies and procedures, including laboratory safety and chemical handling
Follow all Good Laboratory Practices (GLPs) and Good Manufacturing Practices (GMPs)
Perform Quality Assurance (QA) verification of cleaned equipment and support/assist with sanitation
Perform Positive Release duties and micro testing when required
Perform Foreign Material (FM) investigations and product holds when required
Act as the backup for the Quality Technician in their absence
Any other duties as assigned by supervisor or management

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED preferred but not required. Associates or bachelor’s degree in a science-related field is preferred but not required
